Room.Name: Alturis Road/Garden Circle West
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Alturis Road and Garden Circle West.
Room.LongDescription: Garden Circle Road travels around the magnificent Hanging Gardens, a monument to the queen Isaria from her husband, King Randolf the Blue. Randolf got his title by swimming in Lake Kista in the winter. It was pretty much a ritual for him as he dove into the nearly frozen lake every year on his birthday.
